titleStmt.title: Whereas several rolls inquisitions amd other matters of record which concern His Maiesties lordships, mannors, lands, tenements and hereditaments within this kingdom ... have been imbezelled ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, J. Roberts.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1669-1670 : Robartes)
Radnor, John Robartes, Earl of, 1606-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council Chamber in Dublin, the first day of October, 1669."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
